actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement logic to persist API latency and error metrics in a rolling window to Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will improve observability and reliability of performance metrics across deployments.
implementation_steps: Add Redis client initialization in src/config/redis.js if not present.
Update scripts/bench/api-latency.js to write rolling window metrics to Redis after each measurement.
Modify src/utils/metrics.js to support reading/writing rolling window data from Redis.
Test with local Redis instance to ensure metrics persist and aggregate correctly.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and begin implementing a migration plan to convert high-change backend modules (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) from JavaScript to TypeScript, starting with type annotations and tsconfig updates.
implementation_steps: Create or update tsconfig.json for backend.
Rename one or two high-change files (e.g., src/api/routes/someRoute.js) to .ts.
Add basic type annotations for function parameters and return types.
Update package.json scripts to include TypeScript compilation.
Verify build and run tests to ensure no regressions.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Add new Jest tests to cover MCP endpoints and provider health checks, focusing on integration and basic security (e.g., input validation, error handling).
implementation_steps: Identify untested MCP endpoints and provider health routes.
Write new Jest test cases for endpoint responses, error handling, and edge cases.
Run tests and ensure coverage increases.

actionable_tasks.title: Containerize Node Backend and React Frontend with Dockerfiles
actionable_tasks.description: Write simple Dockerfiles for the Node backend and React frontend, and add a docker-compose.yml for local development orchestration.
implementation_steps: Create Dockerfile.backend for Node backend (install deps, copy code, set CMD).
Create Dockerfile.frontend for React frontend (build static files, serve with nginx or similar).
Write docker-compose.yml to orchestrate both services.
